name: NPR
text:
A North Carolina aquarium has drained a 30-foot waterfall and collected 100 gallons of pocket change visitors have thrown into the water while making wishes.
https://t.co/Z5I0Yi8rex

name: NPR
text: The Secret Service says a "male subject and a USSS officer were both transported to a local hospital." https://t.co/Mnb4VFKIpG

name: NPR
text: The Department of Homeland Security watchdog has criticized Border Patrol for not looking for a cheaper alternative to the border wall, such as cutting-edge surveillance technology.  https://t.co/B9zWhPBa8W
